# PyGolomb

> Python library to test binary sequences with Golombâ€™s randomness postulates.

## Installing

## Running

Creating venv and installing dependencies.

```
python3 -m venv .venv
. .venv/bin/activate
poetry install
```

## Testing

```
. .venv/bin/activate
pytest
```

To check test coverage:

```
pytest --cov=pygolomb tests/
```
